chapter.title: Obtaining a copy of Natural C

section.title: Prerequisites
section.para: In order to download and build the project sources, you will need the following:

itemizedlist.listitem: A POSIX-compatible operating system, such as Linux, SunOS, MacOS/X or BSD.
The GCC compiler, preferably version 4.0 or higher

section.title: Downloading
section.para: To get the latest and greatest development sources from the SVN repository, run the following commands:
section.programlisting: svn co http://naturalc.org/svn/ncc/trunk ncc cd ncc autoreconf -f -i
section.para: At this time, there are no source tarballs or binary packages available.

chapter.section:
Building and installing
After you have acquired the source code, issue the following commands to build and install the Natural C compiler, headers, and library.
./configure make make install
